panels.description: Average time required to delivered from Open to Released
panels.title: Average Lead Time (Open -> Released)

panels.description: Average time required to delivered from In Progress to Published
panels.title: Average Cycle Time (In Progress -> Released)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *,
       (SELECT release_date FROM metricsDB.releases s2
        WHERE s2.release_date < s.release_date AND s2.project_key = "$project"
        ORDER BY s2.release_date DESC LIMIT 1) as previous_release
FROM metricsDB.releases s 
WHERE s.release_date IS NOT NULL AND s.project_key = "$project"
ORDER BY s.release_date

SELECT * 
FROM metricsDB.status_changes 
WHERE project_key = "$project"
ORDER BY version

panels.title: Mean time by status per version

panels.description: Average time required to delivered from Open to Released

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *, min(from_date) as min_from_date, max(to_date) as max_to_date
FROM metricsDB.status_changes as status_changes
WHERE project_key = "$project"  AND (from_status = "Open" OR to_status = "Released")
GROUP BY status_changes.key

panels.title: Average Lead Time (Open -> Released)

panels.description: Average time required to deliver from Open to Published. ()

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM metricsDB.status_changes 
WHERE project_key = "$project" AND FIND_IN_SET("${version:text}", version)

panels.title: Lead Time (Open -> Released)

panels.description: Average time required to deliver from In Progress to Released

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM metricsDB.status_changes WHERE project_key = "$project" AND FIND_IN_SET("${version:text}", version)

panels.title: Lead Time (In Progress -> Released)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *,
       (SELECT release_date FROM metricsDB.releases s2
        WHERE s2.release_date < s.release_date
        ORDER BY s2.release_date DESC LIMIT 1) as previous_release
FROM metricsDB.releases s 
WHERE s.project_key = "$project" AND s.name = "${version:text}"
ORDER BY s.release_date

SELECT * FROM metricsDB.status_changes 
WHERE project_key = "$project" AND FIND_IN_SET("${version:text}", version)

list.definition:
SELECT CONCAT(name, "###", DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) as release_date
FROM metricsDB.releases releases
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT version 
  FROM metricsDB.status_changes status_changes
) ticket_versions ON ticket_versions.version = releases.name
 WHERE name NOT LIKE '%,%' AND name NOT LIKE '%''%' AND releases.project_key = "$project"
list.label: Version
list.name: version
list.query:
SELECT CONCAT(name, "###", DATE_FORMAT(release_date, '%Y-%m-%d')) as release_date
FROM metricsDB.releases releases
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT version 
  FROM metricsDB.status_changes status_changes
) ticket_versions ON ticket_versions.version = releases.name
 WHERE name NOT LIKE '%,%' AND name NOT LIKE '%''%' AND releases.project_key = "$project"
